column4: why on earth i cannot watch videos via opera 9.5 ..PLEASE HELP
what types of videos?
flash?
do you have the opera flash plug-in?
I don't know how they distribute it, but maybe?
did you go to the adobe site and search for an opera plugin?
yes but there wasn't any for debian based  distros
you should be able to get the cups drivers and install them using one of the fancy cups GUI configurators...
please can you be more specific
not really... I can look for a package that might have such a tool, but I'm without X myself right now...
kde or gnome?
gnome = gnome-cups-manager
sudo apt-get install gnome-cups-manager
,ok i'm on it
when you run that, you'll probably get some sort of wizard that will eventually prompt you for the cups driver file
you can find a driver for your printer somewhere on the intarwebs, I bet :)
does sun produce your printer?
I expected that your printer manufacturer would have a 'support' area with drivers
i don't have a printer
I obviously have you confused with someone else.
as for you, my friend, visit adobe
see if they have a flash plug-in for opera
i had to download  flashplugin-nonfree,it is strange that the adobe site didn't make a reference to it
